name: Köthe conjecture
summary:
In mathematics, the Köthe conjecture is a problem in ring theory, open as of 2025. It is formulated in various ways. Suppose that R is a ring. One way to state the conjecture is that if R has no nil ideal, other than {0}, then it has no nil one-sided ideal, other than {0}.
